title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: The general secretary of New South Wales Labor Kaila Murnain has resigned after receiving a reported six figure payout from the party. On Thursday an email was sent by the party’s NSW president Mark Lennon, which informed members Ms Murnain had tendered her resignation. The party hasn’t confirmed the exact figure Ms Murnain received as the separation agreement is confidential but there are reports the figure could be as much as $700,000. Ms Murnain stood aside in August after it was revealed to the Independent Commission Against Corruption that she failed to act on information that Chinese billionaire Huang Xiangmo had donated to the party. Image: News Corp Australia
